title: Just purchased a Pixel 2 from Woot. Took it to Verizon to set up and they are asking for a 4 digit
content: Purchased a Pixel 2 from Woot.  Took it to Verizon for set up and they are asking for a 4 digit code.  I can't find a code = have contacted Amazon, Woot, Google and Answer Help.  NO HELP.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
